session.title: Welcome to GulfPCR Valves 2023
session.summary: This session marks the opening of the GulfPCR Valves 2023 conference, welcoming attendees to the event focused on polymerase chain reaction (PCR) and molecular biology techniques related to valvular heart disease interventions.
session.meta_description: Opening session of the GulfPCR Valves 2023 conference on valvular heart disease interventions.
session.teaser_text: Join us for the opening of the GulfPCR Valves 2023 conference focused on valvular heart disease interventions.

session.title: TAVI for bicuspid aortic stenosis patients

objectives.objective: To understand which patients with bicuspid aortic valve are good candidates for TAVI
To review the current sizing options in bicuspid aortic valve anatomy
To share technical tips and tricks to optimize TAVI procedure outcome in patients with bicuspid aortic valve

intervention.title: Imaging analysis and review of current sizing methods for bicuspid aortic valve
TAVI in a bicuspid aortic valve patient with large anatomy

session.summary: Explore this session to gain insights into identifying suitable candidates for TAVI with bicuspid aortic valve anatomy, reviewing current sizing options, and learning technical tips and tricks to optimize TAVI procedure outcomes in these patients.
session.meta_description: Learn to identify TAVI candidates with bicuspid aortic valve, review sizing options, and get technical tips for optimizing procedure outcomes.
session.teaser_title: TAVI for bicuspid aortic stenosis patients
session.teaser_text: Gain insights into selecting TAVI candidates with bicuspid aortic valve, sizing options, and technical tips for optimizing outcomes.

session.title: TAVI and access: alternating is wise

objectives.objective: To know why to use alternative access
To learn which alternative to choose for my patient
To know how to do it

session.summary: In this session, discover why and when to use alternative access routes for TAVI, learn how to choose the appropriate alternative, and understand the techniques involved in approaches like subclavian, carotid, axillary, and transcaval access, as well as calcium modification for challenging femoral access.
session.meta_description: Learn why/when to use alternative TAVI access routes, how to choose the right approach, and techniques like subclavian, carotid, axillary, transcaval access and calcium modification.
session.teaser_title: TAVI and access: alternating is wise
session.teaser_text: Discover alternative TAVI access routes, selection criteria, and techniques like subclavian, carotid, axillary, transcaval access and calcium modification.

session.title: Newer generation self-expanding platform: technical optimisation for common clinical challenges
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Medtronic

objectives.objective: To discuss challenges in TAVI procedural planning
To discuss valve choice in challenging anatomies
To learn more about optimization of valve deployment

intervention.title: Discuss therapeutic options and selected therapy for this patient

session.summary: This sponsored session discusses challenges in TAVI procedural planning, valve choice for challenging anatomies, and optimization of valve deployment, with a focus on a newer generation self-expanding platform.
session.meta_description: Sponsored session on challenges in TAVI planning, valve choice for difficult anatomies, and optimizing valve deployment with a newer self-expanding platform.
session.teaser_text: Learn about optimizing a newer generation self-expanding TAVI platform for procedural planning, challenging anatomies, and valve deployment.

session.title: Essentials of lifetime management of TAVR patients using novel Myval THV
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Meril

objectives.objective: To learn about the novel Myval next generation THV technology, its key features, procedural and clinical benefits and learn about the clinical data in a vast cohort of patient population
To understand the CorAlign technique which enables predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment thus preserving coronary access
To understand the technique of precise sizing, positioning and deployment of Myval THV

intervention.title: Introduction to novel Myval balloon expandable THV and St. Barts experience on XL sizes
Clinical experience with novel Myval THV in Saudi Arabia

session.summary: Explore the novel Myval next-generation transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology in this sponsored session. Gain insights into its key features, procedural and clinical benefits, and clinical data across various patient populations. Understand the CorAlign technique for precise commissural and coronary alignment, as well as techniques for precise sizing, positioning, and deployment of the Myval THV.
session.meta_description: Sponsored session on the novel Myval next-gen THV: features, benefits, clinical data, CorAlign technique for alignment, and sizing/positioning/deployment techniques.
session.teaser_title: Lifetime management with novel Myval THV
session.teaser_text: Learn about the novel Myval next-gen THV's features, benefits, clinical data, alignment technique, and deployment strategies.

session.title: Evidence gap and new indications

objectives.objective: To discuss indications for TAVI for which there is not clear evidence
To evaluate treatment indications for patients with asymptomatic aortic stenosis
To learn about new options for patients with pure aortic regurgitation

intervention.title: A case of moderate symptomatic aortic stenosis
Evidence gaps in the treatment of aortic stenosis
A case of pure aortic regurgitation
New treatment options for patients with aortic regurgitation

session.summary: This session discusses indications for TAVI where clear evidence is lacking, evaluates treatment options for asymptomatic aortic stenosis patients, and explores new possibilities for patients with pure aortic regurgitation.
session.meta_description: Session on TAVI indications lacking clear evidence, treatment for asymptomatic aortic stenosis, and new options for pure aortic regurgitation.
session.teaser_title: Evidence gap and new TAVI indications
session.teaser_text: Explore TAVI indications with unclear evidence, asymptomatic aortic stenosis treatment, and new pure aortic regurgitation options.

session.title: Valve-in-valve: not as simple as it looks

objectives.objective: To appreciate the principles of valve selection for initial and subsequent procedures
To improve your understanding of how to anticipate, plan and perform a TAV-in-TAV procedure
To understand how to prevent coronary obstruction

intervention.title: Sapien 3 valve in degenerated evolute valve

session.summary: Gain insights into the principles of valve selection for initial and subsequent procedures, improve your understanding of how to anticipate, plan, and perform a TAV-in-TAV procedure, and learn how to prevent coronary obstruction in this intricate intervention.
session.meta_description: Session on valve selection principles, planning and performing TAV-in-TAV procedures, and preventing coronary obstruction.
session.teaser_title: Valve-in-valve: not as simple as it looks
session.teaser_text: Learn about valve selection, planning TAV-in-TAV procedures, and preventing coronary obstruction in these complex interventions.

session.title: From access to annulus: overcoming challenging anatomies
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how to select your TAVI device in order to achieve stable deployment in 90 degrees horizontal aorta
To witness smooth deliverabilty even crossing tight and tortous anatomy
To be ready for future coronary access regardless of the height of left or right coronaries

intervention.title: Case 1: recorded case (TAVI case with Navitor with FlexNav system)

session.summary: This sponsored session focuses on selecting the appropriate TAVI device for stable deployment in challenging anatomies, such as horizontal aortas, tight and tortuous vessels, and cases with high coronary take-off, to ensure smooth deliverability and future coronary access.
session.meta_description: Sponsored session on selecting TAVI devices for stable deployment in challenging anatomies like horizontal aortas, tortuous vessels, and high coronary take-off.
session.teaser_text: Learn how to select TAVI devices for stable deployment in challenging anatomies like horizontal aortas, tortuous vessels, and high coronary take-off.

session.title: Learning how to manage TAVI complications

objectives.objective: To understand how to predict major TAVI complication
To know how to evaluate critical TAVI complications
To learn how to treat TAVI complications

session.summary: In this session, gain insights into predicting major TAVI complications, evaluating critical TAVI complications, and learning how to treat TAVI complications effectively.
session.meta_description: Session on predicting major TAVI complications, evaluating critical complications, and learning how to treat TAVI complications.
session.teaser_text: Learn how to predict, evaluate, and treat major and critical complications during TAVI procedures.

session.title: Wrap up
session.summary: This session marks the conclusion of the GulfPCR Valves 2023 conference, providing a wrap-up and summary of the key insights and learnings from the various sessions and discussions.
session.meta_description: Closing session wrapping up the GulfPCR Valves 2023 conference with key insights and learnings.
session.teaser_text: Don't miss the wrap-up session summarizing the key takeaways from the GulfPCR Valves 2023 conference.

To discuss the role of imaging in stenting

LIVE Case from Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia

session.summary: In this live case session, learn how to select patients for left main PCI, explore the best techniques to use in individual cases, and discuss the role of imaging in left main stenting. Witness a live left main PCI case from Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
session.meta_description: Live left main PCI case from Saudi Arabia, discussing patient selection, techniques, and the role of imaging in left main stenting.
session.teaser_title: Live left main PCI case from Saudi Arabia
session.teaser_text: Watch a live left main PCI case and learn about patient selection, techniques, and the role of imaging in left main stenting.

To discuss OCT image interpretation on an interactive session with experts

Tips and tricks for being OCT ready anytime

session.summary: This sponsored session focuses on being OCT-ready in the cathlab every day, learning the MLD-MAX algorithm and use of AI for PCI, and participating in an interactive session with experts on OCT image interpretation.

session.teaser_text: Learn how to be OCT-ready in the cathlab, explore the MLD-MAX algorithm, AI for PCI, and interactive OCT image interpretation.

session.title: How to make simple complex cases. Hands on lab in OCT
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how to use novel AI OCT features in complex clinical scenarios
To learn how streamline decisions based on OCT images to optimize stent results
To enhance your experience in OCT image interpretation interacting with advanced technological platform and experts

intervention.title: Dealing with complex procedures: real world step by step imaging guidance
Key OCT findings that make the difference
Actionable imaging to optimize decisions in various coronary settings (LM, true bifurcation, severe calcification, diffuse disease, ISR)

session.summary: In this hands-on sponsored session, learn how to use novel AI OCT features in complex clinical scenarios, streamline decisions based on OCT images to optimize stent results, and enhance your experience in OCT image interpretation by interacting with an advanced technological platform and experts.
session.meta_description: Sponsored hands-on session on using AI OCT features in complex cases, optimizing stent results with OCT, and interactive OCT image interpretation.

session.summary: This session, in collaboration with the Saudi Arabian Cardiac Intervention Society (SACIS), focuses on understanding the physiology and stages of cardiogenic shock, learning different treatment modalities, and managing patients undergoing high-risk PCI with cardiogenic shock through clinical case discussions.

session.title: How artificial intelligence can help in optimising PCI for treatment of complex lesions
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how artificial intelligence with OCT simplifies procedural strategy, reduce operation time and contrast
To understand value of actionable intracoronary imaging and physiology in optimising patient outcomes
To know the impact of DES platform in the management of a complex patient

intervention.title: Key objectives, strategy, tools and techniques
LIVE Case from Mohammed Bin Khalifa Bin Salman Al Khalifa Specialist Cardiac Centre - Awali, Bahrain
DAPT for patients with complex PCI and high bleeding risk patients
How artificial intelligence simplifies procedural strategy and provides actionable insights for complex PCI

session.summary: This sponsored session discusses how artificial intelligence with OCT can simplify procedural strategies, reduce operation time and contrast usage, and optimize patient outcomes in complex PCI. It also explores the value of actionable intracoronary imaging and physiology, as well as the impact of the DES platform in managing complex patients.
session.meta_description: Sponsored session on using AI with OCT to simplify complex PCI strategies, reduce operation time/contrast, optimize outcomes, and the role of imaging, physiology, and DES.
session.teaser_text: Learn how AI with OCT can simplify complex PCI strategies, reduce operation time and contrast, optimize outcomes, and the role of imaging, physiology, and DES.

objectives.objective: To understand novel tools and techniques for effective management of bifurcation lesions and long diffused lesions using dedicated stenting solutions
To learn about the novel Myval next generation THV technology, its key features, procedural and clinical benefits and learn about the clinical data in a vast cohort of patient population

Tapered vessels need tapered stenting solutions
Myval THV design philosophy with compare TAVI and landmark randomized clinical trial update
Extending treatment opportunities in pulmonary valve interventions
Myval THV case kaleidoscope | Easy access, precise positioning, accurate deployment, intuitive coronary alignment

session.summary: This sponsored session explores novel tools and techniques for effective management of bifurcation lesions and long diffuse lesions using dedicated stenting solutions. It also delves into the novel Myval next-generation transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology, its key features, procedural and clinical benefits, clinical data, the CorAlign technique for precise commissural and coronary alignment, and techniques for precise sizing, positioning, and deployment.
session.meta_description: Sponsored session on novel tools for bifurcation/diffuse lesions, the Myval next-gen THV technology, features, benefits, clinical data, alignment technique, and deployment strategies.

intervention.title: Coronary thrombus shift from infarct-related to non-infarct arteries during primary PCI

session.summary: This session, comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 clinical case submissions, continues to focus on complications that can arise during cathlab procedures, with discussions on cases involving lost devices, unexpected slips, coronary thrombus shift during primary PCI, iatrogenic CTO in post-CABG patients, and coronary bleeding.
session.meta_description: Session with clinical cases on cathlab complications, including lost devices, unexpected slips, coronary thrombus shift during primary PCI, iatrogenic CTO in post-CABG, and coronary bleeding.
session.teaser_text: Explore more cathlab complications through clinical cases on lost devices, unexpected slips, coronary thrombus shift during primary PCI, iatrogenic CTO in post-CABG, and coronary bleeding.

session.title: When routine PCI is not an option
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: Defying the odds: Impella and mitral clip magic
The challenge of huge thrombus burden with massive distal embolisation
PCI to anomalous right coronary artery originating from left main
A solution for a subtotal occluded vessel with an aneurysm

session.summary: This session, comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 clinical case submissions, focuses on scenarios where routine PCI is not an option, with discussions on cases involving Impella and mitral clip, challenging thrombus burden and distal embolization, anomalous coronary artery origins, and a solution for a subtotal occluded vessel with an aneurysm.
session.meta_description: Session with clinical cases on scenarios where routine PCI is not an option, including Impella and mitral clip, challenging thrombus burden, anomalous coronary origins, and subtotal occlusion with aneurysm.
session.teaser_title: When routine PCI is not an option
session.teaser_text: Explore scenarios where routine PCI is not an option through clinical cases on Impella and mitral clip, challenging thrombus burden, anomalous coronary origins, and subtotal occlusion with aneurysm.

session.title: Left main intervention: the good, the bad and the ugly
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: A complex case of left main stump managed with support of IABP
Acute bifurcation during cardiac arrest on CPR

session.summary: This session, comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 clinical case submissions, focuses on left main interventions, with discussions on cases involving complex left main stump management with IABP support, left main coronary artery dissection, complex bifurcation lesions, and acute bifurcation during cardiac arrest on CPR.
session.meta_description: Session with clinical cases on left main interventions, including complex left main stump management with IABP, left main dissection, complex bifurcation lesions, and acute bifurcation during cardiac arrest.
session.teaser_title: Left main interventions: the good, bad, and ugly
session.teaser_text: Explore left main interventions through clinical cases on complex left main stump management with IABP, left main dissection, complex bifurcation lesions, and acute bifurcation during cardiac arrest.

session.title: How to make simple complex cases. Hands on lab in OCT
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how to use novel AI OCT features in complex clinical scenarios
To learn how streamline decisions based on OCT images to optimize stent results
To enhance your experience in OCT image interpretation interacting with advanced technological platform and experts

intervention.title: Dealing with complex procedures: real world step by step imaging guidance
Key OCT findings that make the difference
Actionable imaging to optimize decisions in various coronary settings (LM, true bifurcation, severe calcification, diffuse disease, ISR)

session.summary: In this hands-on sponsored session, learn how to use novel AI OCT features in complex clinical scenarios, streamline decisions based on OCT images to optimize stent results, and enhance your experience in OCT image interpretation by interacting with an advanced technological platform and experts.
session.meta_description: Sponsored hands-on session on using AI OCT features in complex cases, optimizing stent results with OCT, and interactive OCT image interpretation.
session.teaser_title: Hands-on OCT lab for complex cases
session.teaser_text: Explore AI OCT features for complex cases, optimizing stent results, and interactive OCT image interpretation in this hands-on lab.

session.title: Challenging cases – Best case submissions
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: Severe chest pain and shock in young female
Iatrogenic left main coronary artery type F dissection
Mechanical mitral valve thrombosis, can we treat it by catheter intervention?
Refractory ascites - From internal medicine to interventional cardiology

session.summary: This session, comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 clinical case submissions, focuses on challenging cases across various domains, including NSTEMI, other coronary interventions, acute and chronic heart failure, and other valvular and structural interventions. Discussions cover cases involving severe chest pain and shock, iatrogenic left main dissection, mechanical mitral valve thrombosis, refractory ascites, and rotablation complications.
session.meta_description: Session with clinical cases on challenging scenarios, including NSTEMI, coronary interventions, acute/chronic heart failure, valvular/structural interventions, and complications.
session.teaser_text: Explore challenging cases across NSTEMI, coronary interventions, acute/chronic heart failure, valvular/structural interventions, and complications.

session.title: GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Closing Ceremony
session.summary: This session marks the conclusion of the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference, providing a wrap-up and summary of the key insights and learnings from the various sessions and discussions.
session.meta_description: Closing ceremony wrapping up the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference with key insights and learnings.
session.teaser_text: Join us for the closing ceremony of the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference, summarizing the key takeaways from the event.
